text: Hamilton Pereira (born June 26, 1987 in Montevideo) is a Uruguayan footballer currently playing for Cerro Largo. ==Career== Born in Tacuarembó, Pereira began playing football with local side Tacuarembó FC in the Uruguayan league. He joined Peñarol where he would win the 2009–10 Uruguayan Primera División championship. After a spell with River Plate, he moved on loan to Liga MX side Monarcas Morelia in 2014. ==Titles== ;Peñarol * Uruguayan Primera División (1): 2009–10 ;Morelia *Supercopa MX (1): 2014 ==References== ==External links== * Profile at BDFA Profile at * Profile at Soccerway Profile at Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Tacuarembó F.C. players Category:Peñarol players Category:River Plate Montevideo players Category:Monarcas Morelia footballers Category:Danubio F.C. players Category:Barcelona S.C. footballers Category:Club Atlético Sarmiento footballers Category:Club Atlético Tigre footballers Category:Club Atlético Los Andes footballers Category:Deportivo Maldonado players Category:Cerro Largo F.C. players Category:Liga MX players Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Primera B Nacional players Category:Ecuadorian Serie A players Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Uruguayan Segunda División players Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Ecuador Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Argentina Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Ecuador Category:Association football midfielders
